title: Downwards Black Arrow

adjectives: Being or moving lower in position or less in some value
nouns: A mark to indicate a direction or relation
A mark to indicate a direction or relation.
A sign or symbol used to indicate a direction (e.g. \to).
The management or direction of the affairs of a public or private office, business or organization.
Government, control, superintendence, physical or manual handling or guidance; act of managing by direction or regulation, or administration, as management of family, or of household, etc.

description:
An arrow, pointing down.

Generally used to highlight a piece of content placed below where this emoji can be used. This content could be a picture, a website link, or a different piece of text,

See the glossary for information on the term black in unicode character names.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the down arrow emoji is presented with a crisp, clean aesthetic, featuring a bold, solid arrowhead pointing downwards. Its design emphasizes clarity and direction through Apple's signature smooth gradients and subtle 3D form, giving it a slightly raised, tactile appearance. This emoji is universally understood to indicate a downward movement, a lower position, or a continuation, frequently used in lists, navigation, or to signify a decrease.
